creator: teddy.wang@cn.arthurandersen.com
text:
A test program while running the statement:
result = stmt.executeQuery("SELECT * FROM time_rpt..TB_USER");
will cause a memory error as:
--Java.exe - Applicaton error
--"0x77f8aa57" instruction refered "0x09b9dcc4" memory which can't be read.

Environment:
JDK1.2.2; use jdbc:odbc driver

Running on Windows NT 4 is OK.

creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text: I don't think this is a Tomcat problem.
